summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, dated August 15, 2019, transmitting a status memo regarding the Epstein case. The email indicates ongoing legal proceedings and communication between prosecutors.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email transmitting a status memo regarding the Epstein case from the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Status Memo Preparation
events.description: A status memo regarding the Epstein case was finalized, as indicated by the attached document filename.

events.title: Status Memo Transmission
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emailed a finalized status memo regarding the Epstein case to a recipient.

locations.name: Southern District of New York
locations.context: The jurisdiction of the prosecutor sending the email.

locations.name: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
locations.context: The address of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 15, 2019, from an Assistant United States Attorney in the SDNY.
The email transmits an attached status memo regarding the Epstein case, finalized on August 14, 2019.
The communication indicates active prosecutorial work on the Epstein case in August 2019, shortly before Epstein's death.
